title: [Bug]: App automatically closes
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Sometimes the app randomly closes and I have to install it again for it to work, I've tried both AUR and Flatpak and neither work. I know it's not a problem with my PC since I have a coworker who has Ubuntu 22.04 and tried installing snap and the same thing happens.

### What package are you using?

aur

### Version

2.1.0-1
